is a Japanese actress. She appeared in Mikio Naruse's "Floating Clouds" (1955) and "Nagareru" (1956). She also appeared in Shinji Aoyama's "My God, My God, Why Hast Thou Forsaken Me?" (2005).
She is married to director Yoshishige Yoshida.
